properties.title: Funds Removed
properties.details: In mid-March, President Donald Trump signed an order mandating seven federal entities be stripped down to their minimum functions as required by law. The list included the Institute of Museum and Library Services, the primary source of federal support for the nationâ€™s museums and libraries.
properties.Organization: Institute of Museum and Library Services

properties.title: Funding Cut
properties.details: For the state Department of Health, the cuts will terminate roughly $7 million in federal grants that have been used to track infectious disease, improve access to vaccines and address health disparities.

properties.title: Funding Cut
properties.details: The Vermont Department of Mental Health also expects to lose hundreds of thousands of dollars as a result of now-discontinued grants from the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration.
